function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through the built environment","Impact":"Increased illness and mortality, strain on healthcare systems","Mitigation":"Implementation of infection control measures, promoting vaccination, public health education","Technologies":"Air filtration systems, UV-C sanitation devices","People":"General public, healthcare workers, vulnerable populations","Owner":"Public health authorities, facility management, government"}]}
